content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. What price were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 300 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. The location and the quality of the apartment justify a higher price. How about 500 euros per month? This is a very fair offer, considering the current market rates.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for me. I would be able to pay 400 euros per month. I am a dependable and responsible tenant.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but 400 euros is still not enough for me to accept. This apartment is in high demand due to its central location. If you're serious about the apartment, I think you'll find that 500 euros is a very reasonable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective. However, I am really trying to save as much as possible. I could pay 450 euros per month. I am a smart person and I could help you with some tasks if you want. That would be a win-win situation.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While I appreciate the offer of assistance, I'm looking for a straightforward financial arrangement. 450 euros is still not what I'm looking for. The apartment is brand new and very comfortable. I believe a tenant of your caliber would appreciate the value of 500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your confidence in me. However, I still cannot afford 500 euros per month. I could pay 475 euros per month. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am not easily tricked by other people. That's why I am a trustworthy tenant.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your moral and ethical standards are commendable, but I must reiterate that the value of this apartment is 500 euros per month. This is the price that reflects its quality and location. If you're not willing to pay this price, I'm sorry, but I cannot accept your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we cannot seem to agree on a price that works for both of us.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Max. It seems we have reached an impasse. If you are not willing to pay 500 euros per month, then I'm afraid we cannot proceed with the rental agreement. Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable apartment within your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
